scripts.build-export: npm run load-data && next build && next export
scripts.benchmark-512: cross-env NUM_PAGES=512 npm run build-export | gnomon
scripts.benchmark-4096: cross-env NUM_PAGES=4096 npm run build-export | gnomon
scripts.benchmark-8192: cross-env NUM_PAGES=8192 npm run build-export | gnomon
scripts.benchmark-32768: cross-env NUM_PAGES=32768 npm run build-export | gnomon
